text: ibaraaheem ne apane baap ke lie jo kshama kee praarthana kee thee, vah to keval ek vaade ke kaaran kee thee, jo vaada vah usase kar chuka tha. phir jab usapar yah baat khul gaee ki vah allaah ka shatru hai to vah usase virakt ho gaya. vaastav mein, ibaraaheem bada hee komal hrday, atyant sahanasheel tha
